```{r, include=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Development libraries
library(roxygen2)
roxygen2::roxygenise()
```

```{r}
# library initialization
library(ggplot2)
library(gridExtra)
```

```{r}
# INITIALIZE PALMID WORKSPACE -------------------

# Import a palmprint-analysis
ps.waxsys <- read.fev('data/waxsys.fev', FIRST = TRUE)

```

```{r}
# ANALYZE PALMPRINT -----------------------------
# Print out standard palmscan report
system('cat data/waxsys.txt')

# Generate a palmid-report
waxsys.report <- PlotReport(ps.waxsys, palmdb)

# Print out palmid-report
plot(waxsys.report)
```

```{r}
# SAVE PP-REPORT --------------------------------
png(filename = "test/waxsys.ppreport.png", width = 800, height = 400)
  plot(waxsys.report)
dev.off()
```
